## Produce a hexagon logo with `hexSticker` library

```{r}
# load dependency
# install.packages("hexSticker")
library(hexSticker)
```

```{r}
# create the hexSticker
airplane_img <- "image/logo.png"
sticker(airplane_img, package="LufthansaR", p_size=20, s_x=1, s_y=.75, s_width=.6,
        h_fill="#f9690e", h_color="#f39c12",
        filename="image/hexlogo.png")
```
